animeDescription: This is simply the OVA summing up the major events and battles of "Initial D 4th Stage" much like the "Initial D Battle Stage" original summed up the first 3 seasons. Additionally, has 2 extra battles from the manga that were not incorporated into the original 4th Stage.(Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Full story: Initial D Fourth Stage', 'Prequel: Initial D Battle Stage', 'Sequel: Initial D Battle Stage 3']
